title: Toolbelt
content:
The toolbelt interface is a 10-slot inventory separate from the backpack. It can hold tools used in certain quests and supplies used while train certain professions and exploration. The toolbelt also has the money pouch, which displays the currently held amount of Gold, Silver, and Copper coins.

The maximum amount of profession items that can be stored on the toolbelt is 999.

Its default position in the main interface is the fourth slot from the bottom in the lower left corner. It becomes available when the player characters receives the first item stored in the toolbelt. The default keybind for the interface is T.
